comment: I'm not sure if Trump will, he was friends with the Clintons in the past. He would be investigating the whole DNC if he wanted to clear "the swamp". He's doing a few things that will help but if the midterms go south, this country will just keep getting worse. There is nothing like this is recent history, unless we want to look at communist Russia, maybe Venezuela.

comment: Hey there, sexist comments and views are rude and unwelcome. Please respect woman and refrain from these type of comments. Thank you
